text: (Those who believed) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an (and left their homes) and migrated from Mecca to Medina (and strove for the cause of Allah) in obedience of Allah, (and those who took them in) those who hosted Muhammad (pbuh) and his Companions (and helped them) at Badr (these are the believers in truth) truly and certainly. (For them is pardon) for the sins they committed in the life of this world, (and a bountiful provision) a good reward in Paradise.
